title: GetPriorityArray (Method)
text:
METHOD GetPriorityArray : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets the Priority-Array of this BACnet object. The returned pointer pPrioArray is
allocated with the corresponding data, whereas the user has to use FreeStackAllocatedMemory,
to free the allocated memory after data usage.

rows.Name: pPrioArray
rows.Comment:
The returned Pointer gets filled with the data of the Priority Array AND (!) the data referenced within the array
(i.e. strings, etc.).
After usage, useFreeStackAllocatedMemory, to free the used memory again.
